channel.title: Old man from barrows don't wanna talk
channel.description:
well i did everything of the barrows mini game !!!3times!!! tut of phone but he don't wanna talk !! i don't know other people also say but he don't help us i have freescape
somobdy help me plz this is the link of tut http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,56627.0.html

item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

[quote=“Zenzie, post:3, topic:73357”]add this in NPCHandler

else if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(50) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "TEXT"; } }

above

				} else if (npcs[i].IsDead == true) {

Omg you stupid? he has to talk properly like when you click talk!..
